alert.note: Alert for Union; Wallowa (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 21 at 6:24PM PDT until May 21 at 7:00PM PDT by NWS Pendleton
info.description: The National Weather Service in Pendleton Oregon has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Union County in northeastern Oregon... Southern Wallowa County in northeastern Oregon... * Until 700 PM PDT. * At 624 PM PDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 15 miles south of Joseph, or 20 miles south of Enterprise, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Joseph. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather, contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Pendleton Oregon. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
